title: User Jouney
description: The core Journey event captures the state of the user. A journey can have multiple versions. A single user would be on a single wversion of a journey and their path is decided by the version they are on.

xdm:journeyUID.title: Journey Identifier
xdm:journeyUID.description: The unique identifier for the journey.

xdm:journeyVerUID.title: Journey version
xdm:journeyVerUID.description: The unique identifier denoting the version of journey.

xdm:actionUID.title: Action Identifier
xdm:actionUID.description: Unique Identifier denoting the action to be performed.

xdm:actionType.title: Action Type
xdm:actionType.description: The type of action to be performed.

xdm:eventId.title: Event id
xdm:eventId.description: The identifier for event which is reponsible for possible state change in current journey.

xdm:isError.title: Error
xdm:isError.description: Describes if there was an error in taking action or event.

xdm:isJourneyEntered.title: Journey Entry
xdm:isJourneyEntered.description: Informs if this is the start of a journey.

xdm:isJourneyExited.title: Journey Exit
xdm:isJourneyExited.description: Informs if this is the end of a journey.

xdm:isJumpAction.title: Jump action
xdm:isJumpAction.description: Informs if this event results in a jump inside a journey.
